entry.title: Vulnhub Sar 1
entry.summary: Solving this box involve taking advantage of an vulnerability in the Sar2HTML web application, then making use of the cron scheduler to gain root on the box. About the box Name: Sar: 1 Date release: 15 Feb 2020 Author: Love Series: Sar Description on Vulnhub Sar is an OSCP-Like VM with the intent of gaining experience in the world of penetration testing. Recon Starting off with nm...

entry.title: Vulnhub Tiki 1
entry.summary: This box centers around a remote authentication bypass in Tiki Wiki CMS Groupware 21.1. Enumeration Starting of with nmap - nmap -sC -sV -oA nmap ip-adress Services running on the box On port 80 is the default Ubuntu Apache “It works” page. The robots.txt file points to the /tiki installation Looking at that presents the tiki deafalt page Trying the usual admin:admin fails; So o...

entry.title: Virtualbox CLI - Getting started with vboxmanage

link.title: Virtualbox CLI - Getting started with vboxmanage

entry.summary: Virtualization by now certainly needs no introduction. As a Linux / nix user there are many solid options available. On Linux you have Libvirt, QEMU/Kvm, Gnome Boxes which uses the former as a base and lately Canonical’s Multipass for Ubuntu appliances’s. Most of the BSD’s also have their own native solution, FreeBSD has BHYVE, OpenBSD has VMM etc. There is also VMware’s range of products, Play...

entry.title: Vulnhub Hemisphere Gemini
entry.summary: Gemini is part of the Hemisphere series of VM’s by d4t4s3c found on Vulnhub. It’s classed as a easy machine with an emphasis on enumeration of a web application followed by some Linux privilege escalation. I’m running the VM in Virtualbox on a Kali host with a bridged network. Enumeration Starting with nmap: # Nmap 7.91 scan initiated Fri Nov 20 04:54:04 2020 as: nmap -p- -sV -sC -oA nmap.ap...
